name: Mediocre Container Package
description:
This game was created for TriJam #206, just under three hours. The theme was "just another copy", so I've tried to clone an existing game: Super Crate Box.

There's only one weapon and one level, but you can double jump and head stomp enemies as well! :)

Controls:

  • W to jump
  • A/D to move
  • SPACE to shoot
  • F to toggle fullscreen
  • R to restart

I've recorded the development process with (Hungarian) commentary, once I've finished editing the footage it will be up on YouTube and embedded here.

I've used the following amazing 3rd party assets:

  • Seasonal tilesets by grafxid
  • Sprite Pack 1 by grafxkid
  • Weapon sprites by vladpenn

Sound effects were created with ChipTone. You can download the project file as well if you'd like to take a look. But it's quite messy :)
